attributes.action: Encourage the use of Windfall Wood and wood from demolition of old houses as a domestic heating fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In some areas of the country there is considerable Windfall Wood just allowed to rot in Woodlands.  Forestry operations can leave behind considerable "sub-standard"  off cuts.
Demolition and re-furbishment can generate a large quantity of wood.
Can the Government please investigate the possibility of using all this wood as a domestic heating fuel?
